name: BattleTanks (itch) (Jia Ching)
description:
Try getting 2000 points and see what happen? Destroy as many enemies as possible to level up!

BattleTank is inspired by the retro BattleCity gameplay.

Developed by Ng Jia Ching

Credits

BattleTanks is a survival game. Inspired by BattleTanks

All SFX from FreeSound.org  

Tank Logo Image by Skitterphoto from Pexels

Warning and Info Lights - by http://raremeatgames.co.za/playitforward/
